Pre-Game Insights: Denver Nuggets are on a 3-game win streak
Miami Heat have a 3-4 record in the Eastern Conference
Others: The game is scheduled for Denver on 9 p.m. EST on Nov. 9
Injury updates: Vlatko Cancar (ankle), Jamal Murray (concussion), Aaron Gordon (calf), DaRon Holmes II (achilles) are day to day for the Nuggets. Kevin Love and Jaime Jaquez Jr. are out for the Heat.
